parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1.42

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a child control with specified idc from a controls group

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> ctrlgrp [[controlsGroupCtrl]] idc

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ctrlgrp: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name> x1</name>=<value> <code>_control = _controlsGroup [[controlsGroupCtrl]] 101;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allDisplays]], [[allControls]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlParentControlsGroup]]
</value></part></template></root>
